text: The High Commissioner of Canada in Sri Lanka HE Shelley Whiting made a call on to the Secretary to the Ministry of Defence Mr. Kapila Waidyaratne PC yesterday (08th Tuesday, August) at the Ministry.During the meeting a cordial discussion was held between the Secretary and the High Commissioner on matters of bilateral importance and mutual relevance.The Secretary also presented a memento to the High Commissioner to mark the occasion.The High Commissioner of Canada in Sri Lanka HE Shelley Whiting made a call on to the Secretary to the Ministry of Defence Mr. Kapila Waidyaratne PC yesterday (08th Tuesday, August) at the Ministry.During the meeting a cordial discussion was held between the Secretary and the High Commissioner on matters of bilateral importance and mutual relevance.The Secretary also presented a memento to the High Commissioner to mark the occasion.
title: Canadian HC meets Secretary
